definitions.body: upper Bethhoron, ´[[ע]] Jos 16:5 [[העליון]] 1Ch 7:24, 2Ch 8:5, the upper (opp. lower), of house Ne 3:25; cf. 2Ki 15:35, 2Ch 23:20 + 5 t., + Ge 40:17 (uppermost basket); fs. [[הָעֶלְיוֹנׇה]] the upper pool 2Ki 18:17 = Is 36:2, Is 7:3; the highest side-chamber ([[חֵלָע]]) Ez Eze 41:7; fpl. [[הָעֶלְיוֹנׁת]] Eze 42:5 the upper chambers ([[לְשָׁכוֹת]]).
of Davidic king exalted above monarchs Ps 89:28 (cf. De 28:1, supr.).
